name: The Odyssey: The Search for Ulysses
name_original: The Odyssey: The Search for Ulysses
description:
The Odyssey: The Search for Ulysses is an adventure game developed by Cryo Interactive Entertainment and Index. It came out on 01-01-2000. Cryo Interactive Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play The Odyssey: The Search for Ulysses on PC.
